# Statistical Summary

Here we create statistical summary from the data.

- Grammar of tables

There are some packages that are great at creating summary tables. 

- gtsummary


![](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/figures/logo.png)


- arsenal

![](https://mayoverse.github.io/arsenal/reference/figures/logo.png){width=35%}


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)

mpg %>% glimpse()
mpg %>% 
  select(cyl, cty) %>% 
  tbl_summary()
```
